column4: if i unplug a PS/2 keyboard and plug it back in without rebooting, it should work, right?
if i unplug a PS/2 keyboard and plug it back in without rebooting, it should work, right?
I've never had an issues doing it, but like cheapie says theoretically you could fry your MB.
Amen.  I think it goes the wheel, sliced bread, screen
